title.rendered: Alexander Volt Participated in European Internet Forum on Behalf of Intellectsoft

content.rendered:
On September 28th, the Solutions Advisor at Intellectsoft, Alexander Volt has participated in the European Internet Forum on behalf of our company. Alexander held a speech dedicated to the digitalization of the healthcare industry in the EU.

The event itself, organized by the members of the European Parliament, is an independent and transparent forum debating digital policy issues with stakeholders. The main aim of the forum was to better understand the potential of the Internet and its impact on the EU’s economy, society, and governance.

Therefore, it was a huge honor for Intellectsoft to take part in such an important and authoritative event.

Our colleague, Alexander Volt represented Intellectsoft and discussed the digital transformation of health systems, its benefits for citizens, governmental organizations, and institutions, main challenges it addresses for the European Union. After his speech, Alexander has participated in the Q&A session.

Watch the speech recording by following the link.
